name: Mets
title: CS Mets at DX
notes: **Note**: Involvement of inguinal, pelvic, or external iliac lymph nodes (codes 11 and 12) with previous scrotal or inguinal surgery prior to presentation of the testis tumor is coded in CS Lymph Nodes as regional node involvement and not in CS Mets at DX.
